chunks.text: This question can come that how do you change the magnetic strength? Tell three reasons. First, by increasing the current. Second, number of turns per unit length. What is next? The next is that you can change the radius of the coil.

Similarly, what we put inside a solenoid, we call it a core.

chunks.title: Class 10th - Magnetic Effects of Electric Current  ScienceMagnetic Field Lines Due to Solenoid
chunks.text: If we change the material of the core, then it can change your magnetic strength. Now we are talking about the core, so let's talk about the material. The material that we have to use in the core is of two types. There are some types of nickel and iron.
